name: Draw Picture
req_funcs:
draw_picture:
    pusha
    lodsw
    mov bp, ax
    lodsw
    mov bx, ax
.row_loop:
    push cx
    mov di, bp
.col_loop:
    lodsb
    mov ah, 0x0c
    push bx
    xor bh, bh
    int 0x10
    pop bx
    inc cx
    dec di
    jnz .col_loop
    pop cx
    inc dx
    dec bx
    jnz .row_loop
    popa
    ret
